page.title: 06ENVIRONMENT
page.content: {INDUSTRIAL }Fords is the only large factory in this area, and is built on the site of some ponds and near{Old {Hutte}and is situated on{A561,}known as the Ford Road. It employs both men and women in its various departments. {HOUSING}The housing in this area of Speke, mainly consists of bungalows, flats, detached and semi-detached houses, terraced houses with a few converted farmhouses. In Hale mainly of three types, small cottages at the centre of village, various small in-fill houses scattered around village and small housing estates on the fringe. There are some large detatched houses towards Speke. {FARMING }There are a few farms in this area which grow daffodils wheat and potatoes, there are no sheep or cattle, although some pigs are being kept.
